availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Peter McKegney (Louisville, Kentucky, overseer and drayman)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, overseer and drayman. Native of Ireland. Married to Margaret Gunn McKegney in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on June 5, 1862. Father of Mary Ann McKegney and Joseph McKegney. Overseer in Louisville in 1860. Drayman in Louisville in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 8, p. 148A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film 000482709.
